name: カービィのきらきらきっず
summary:
Kirby's Star Stacker is a 1997 puzzle video game developed by HAL Laboratory for the Game Boy. This game is Kirby's first puzzle game that is not a clone of an existing title, and the final Kirby game without copy abilities until the fifth episode of Kirby: Right Back at Ya!
It received a remake for the Super Famicom in Japan.
